turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HI, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with ordering from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Carame Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which store would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Old York Road in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande, caramel macchiato with 2% milk, from old york road starbucks, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you're all set, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. I appreciate it.
